originalText.text: I have been going to this dentist for over 30 years, and have always found the experience to be excellent.  From basic teeth cleaning, to complicated root canal work, Dr Seiden and everyone in his office are professional and excellent at their work.  Both he and his office practice are always excellent, and I have referred many people, who have all agreed with me.

text.text: I have been going to this dentist for over 30 years, and have always found the experience to be excellent.  From basic teeth cleaning, to complicated root canal work, Dr Seiden and everyone in his office are professional and excellent at their work.  Both he and his office practice are always excellent, and I have referred many people, who have all agreed with me.

originalText.text: I have been coming to Dr Seiden for many years and have only had very good experiences with him and his staff.  One of the qualities that I really appreciate is his gentle touch. I have never felt pain in his care and I am extremely sensitive.  I would almost say that novacaine is not needed for most procedures.  My husband and my daughter are also patients of Dr Seiden and feel about him as I do. Over the years I have referred others, including my sometimes difficuly elderly father (who got along well with Dr Seiden), and none were disappointed. His assistants, hygienist and receptionist are excellent too, living up to Dr Seiden's high standards.  I recommend him to anyone looking for a great dentist!

originalText.text:
I first met Dr. Michael Seiden over 35 years ago though my wife.  She began with him 2 years prior.  He was great, better than most others I’d gone to before and our insurance covered many procedures.

Our insurance coverage changed three times since then, however, and hoping to save we moved on to other Upper East Side practices.  A mistake for the most part.  One time procedures too often turned multiple.  When insurance all but disappeared we went for the best deal we could find, almost every visit then required another (and another).  The expensive periodontal follow-ups finally convinced me to go back to Dr. Seiden.

A penny saved thrice spent.

We have DentalSave now, not great savings, but significant given my more frequent fixes of late for inadequate work done  previously.  Dr. Seiden is superlatively expert, patient with all age groups, brilliant and friendly.  We shouldn’t need another dentist as long as we live.

May he live longer than us and prosper.

originalText.text: Please allow this to serve, without reservation, Dr. Michael Seiden, as your next dentist.  Dr. Seiden's office is professional, organized and efficient, with a great staff and appointments are always on time.  Dr. Seiden has provided me with several excellent and reliable procedures with his dental skills, for a few years now, and leaving me a very satisfied customer.  You won't be disappointed.

text.text: Please allow this to serve, without reservation, Dr. Michael Seiden, as your next dentist.  Dr. Seiden's office is professional, organized and efficient, with a great staff and appointments are always on time.  Dr. Seiden has provided me with several excellent and reliable procedures with his dental skills, for a few years now, and leaving me a very satisfied customer.  You won't be disappointed.

originalText.text: Dr. Seiden, within a short time, I knew I was in the office of a Pro; an excellent Dentist and a very Professional staff.   I was in a medical office that was run properly, about the Patient and their dental issues first.    The hygienist, wasn't fooling around, she takes cleaning the patients teeth, very seriously.    Also he referred to what seems to be another Pro, my new oral/max surgeon.  My prior oral/max surgeon abandoned me as a patient when I did have the complications of severe Inflammation which I warned him about in advance.
